short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check upto 3 languages and their percentages of the provided string

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every Language Checker checks text language, tells the name of the language in which the text or paragraph is written. You just need to select the paragraph or text and copy that and paste that into Every Language Checker to check the language.
